docs.title: Home
docs.text: WcFlow a library for creating weather and climate workflows from a yaml format inspired by cylc using AiiDA as workflow engine.

docs.title: Developer tools
docs.text:
To manage the repo we use [hatch]{.title-ref} please install it

pip install hatch
hatch test # run tests
hatch fmt # run formatting
hatch run docs:build # build docs
hatch run docs:serve # live preview of doc for development
